docs.snippet: FIFTEEN years ago three men-- F.B. Rentschler, D.L. Brown  and G.J. Mead--set up shop in one corner of an idle machine tool factory in Hartford, Conn., and quietly and modestly began to design and build an airplane engine.

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, Aug. 22--President Roberto M. Ortiz resigned today in the midst of an acute government crisis because of a Senate resolution associating him by implication with the socalled Palomar land scandal, which has created a public...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, Aug. 22--President Roberto M. Ortiz resigned today in the midst of an acute government crisis because of a Senate resolution associating him by implication with the socalled Palomar land scandal, which has created a public sensation here.
